data.title: Random Avril Discussion Thread
data.meta_description: Currently I notice something not making sense at the end of "My Happy Ending" Can you hear the sound like something was falling at the very end of the song?
data.text:
StrongSweet

Member

Join Date:

Posts: 3,326

Likes: 2,094

Last Online:

Post by StrongSweet on

It's me, u know

Currently I notice something not making sense at the end of "My Happy Ending"

Can you hear the sound like something was falling at the very end of the song?

@3:57

Dillon

Post by Dillon on

All I hear are the drums. Is that what you're referring to?

And also, we already have a random discussion thread in the general discussion board. If this thread is going to stay open for all random (non-thread worthy) avril discussion, then I think it should be renamed "Random Avril Discussion" just so everyone will know that there's a difference and won't confuse it with the other thread.

Deleted

Deleted Member

Join Date:

Posts: 0

Likes:

Last Online:

Post by Deleted on

All I hear are the drums.

Turn your volume ALL THE WAY UP and you can hear this "whoosh, whoosh, whoosh" sound. I think that's what he means.

There's also a spooky sound effect at the end of Sipped Away that I've always liked [3:23]:-

Becky

MOTM May '17

Things don't change, we do

Post by Becky on

Does this fit here?:

Am I the only person who doesn't like Avril's pronunciation in some of her live performances? I can't describe it, it's like she's putting on an accent and everything is very 'oo' sounding. It bugs me and she sounds so much better when she sings properly IMO. She didn't used to do it.
